data.description:
VRIT is a VR fitness game made possible by the Quest's hand-tracking feature to let you do true exercises without controllers.
Destroy robots and earn rewards while doing your daily workout : VRIT makes fitness fun.

- Full body exercises ! -
Do actual abs, push-ups, burpees and a lot more without having to care about controllers !
VRIT can accurately follow your movements using only your head's position.

- Do your daily workout in the ADVENTURE MODE ! -
The difficulty of the challenges you face will adapt to you over time !
Get additional rewards by playing it multiple days in a row !

- CUSTOM PROGRAMS ! -
Create your own workout programs and save them !

- MUCH, MUCH MORE ! -
VRIT is more than a simple workout app.
Shoot robots using your hands while running in the RUN phases !
Earn cosmetics for your tiny island such as new surfaces and special props !
Compete with your friends in the leaderboards !

It's time for your daily dose of action-packed sport.

Update v2.2 is now available for VRIT ! üí™

Here are the patch notes :

- The game now targets 90fps instead of 80fps and uses Vulkan for rendering instead of OpenGLES3
- There are now bubbles that will appear at regular intervals in SpeedRUN mode (in a predictable and fair manner, of course). Popping them will deduct 2 seconds from your time. ‚è±Ô∏è
- Improved the bullets charging mechanic during Run phases. Your hands now get all shiny when fully charged ! ‚ú®
- You can now destroy the "big bad bullets" from those big robots by shooting 10 bullets at them.
- The exercise instructions will appear slowly only when you come across them for the first time.

Update 2.1 is now available for VRIT üí™
Here are the patch notes :

- Added a warning on the startup screen if hand tracking is disabled
- Improved the slider buttons
- Improved the Crossbody Toe Touch animation during warmup
- Reworked the "shoot" animation in the Run rules
- Added a mention of the "hand closed" gesture in the Run rules
- Improved the stretching music mix

VRIT 2.0 Patch notes :
+ Added all the new dialogues written by the community ÔøΩÔøΩ
+ New super secret shooting mechanic for Run phases (there's a tip about it!)
+ New Stretching session at the end of days
+ New Warmup exercises
+ Improved the game's first launch experience
+ The bots can now have random cosmetics ÔøΩ
+ New Run musics (heard in the two last levels and SpeedRUN mode) ÔøΩ
+ Added a new Oculus Leaderboard which shares your number of days played
+ Birds ?
- Improved the opening cutscene at the start of days
- The maximum Run level is now 100
- Removed all negative/insulting dialogues from the robots
- New uplifting Warmup intro ÔøΩ
- New musics when you get a Power Crystal
- Reworked the "Crouched Walking" phase, which is now called "Duck Walk"
- Your in-game hands will now adapt to your real hands size
- More tips in the main menu
- Added a notice about hand tracking issues at startup
- The Evil Cube now have rounded edges
- Removed movement restrictions on some exercises
- Rewrote some of the exercises instructions
- Multiple bug fixes and optimizations

The game went from 3.99$ to 4.99$, which is its definitive price.
It has remained at this price point since its first version, but I think it's now worth that little extra.

- RUN : Rearranged the main theme and added a second part
- RUN : If you get hit, there is now a 1 second delay before you can receive damage again (your remaining hearts will blink during this time)
- ALL PHASES : Added about 20% more time during exercises, to let you focus on doing the correct gesture
- ADVENTURE MODE : New bots dialogues
- GENERAL : Hopefully fixed the crash issues. I've done a lot of optimizations and completed two times SpeedRUN without any issue. Fingers crossed ü§û

- Added new tips in the main menu
- Hopefully fixed the squats bug

Patch v1.0e :
- The "how to run" tip will no longer show up in the Run phase when there are enemies
- You can no longer shoot in the Run phase when there's nothing to shoot at
- Fixed a typo in the main menu

A new VRIT update is now available !
Polish, polish, polish !

- You can now disable the Crouched Walking phase if your playspace isn't big enough
- A new "Squat Running" setting is available to let you play the Adventure Mode silently (instead of running during the Run phases, you do squats !)
- Added a night version of the main menu music
- Added new tips in the main menu !
- Optimized the Run phase

Hotfix v1.0c :
- Fixed a bug that would prevent the save from loading correctly when going back to the main menu

+ New "Side Plank" phase
+ New "Burpees" phase

- Various graphical improvements
- Bug fixes
